mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (EMP_NO, EMP_NM, EML, TELNO, ADDRESS, APRV, DEPT_ID, DEPT, HBY, HBY_ID) VALUES (#{EMP_NO}, #{EMP_NM}, #{EML}, #{TELNO}, #{ADDRESS}, #{APRV}, #{DEPT_ID}, #{DEPT}, #{HBY}, #{HBY_ID})
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NM, DEPT, APRV FROM board WHERE EMP_NM LIKE '%'||#{value}||'%'
SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NM, EML, TELNO, ADDRESS, APRV, DEPT, HBY FROM board WHERE EMP_NO = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET EMP_NM=#{EMP_NM}, EML=#{EML}, TELNO=#{TELNO}, ADDRESS=#{ADDRESS}, APRV=#{APRV}, DEPT_ID=#{DEPT_ID}, DEPT=#{DEPT}, HBY=#{HBY}, HBY_ID=#{HBY_ID} WHERE EMP_NO=#{EMP_NO}
